thread.section_title: Shop4Seats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Shop4Seats | shop4seats.com
thread.title: Nate Gose

author: Nate Gose
title: Nate Gose
text:
My order arrived damaged from the shipping company, so I contacted JOHN JASSO at Shop4Seats and he took care of everything! Since they had to remake the seat due to the damage and a dimensional paperwork error, I asked if I could change the width to fit even better in my van. He promptly responded that they are happy to accommodate my request! I should have the new seat in a few weeks at no charge!
THANKS JOHN AND SHOP4SEATS
